alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 12:01PM CDT until May 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. St. Louis River At Scanlon affecting Carlton County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of rural areas near Fort Ripley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday, May 16 the stage was 11.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Monday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.1 feet Monday, May 15. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 07/17/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Fort Ripley 10.5 10.9 Mon 9 am CDT 11.1 11.1 10.9 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1130 AM CDT.
